alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 17 at 12:23PM AKDT until October 20 at 1:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...The following area, Near the Taiya River. * WHEN...Until 400 PM AKDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas near The Taiya River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1214 PM AKDT, River gauge reports indicate high water levels from heavy rain in the Taiya River basin. The river level is above minor flood stage but crested around 10am since rain has ended and will continue to fall through the afternoon. - For Taiya River near Skagway: At 12:00pm the stage was 16.85 feet. Flood Stage is 16.5 feet. Forecast: Continuing to fall through Monday afternoon. River rises are expected again Tuesday night. Impacts: At 16.8 feet: Portions of the first few miles of the Chilkoot Trail will begin to inundate with water to ankle depth.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
